doc.title: Silvio Berlusconi warns Mob
doc.author: Associated Press; Guardian staff reporter
doc.description: Prime minister says Italy will crack down on organised crime over the next four years

main.p: Prime minister Silvio Berlusconi says Italy will crack down on organised crime over the next four years. The strategy could involve deploying more soldiers to southern cities and towns where mobsters are powerful. Interior minister Roberto Maroni said sending soldiers to Naples had discouraged crime wars.
main.head: Silvio Berlusconi warns Mob
